issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
PROBLEM: Currently if the upgrade is not finalized the balancer just exits as it cannot move any blocks as no deletes can go through the datanodes before a finalize. This is not clear to users.

EXPECTED BEHAVIOR:
Balancer should exit saying something like "Balancer exiting as upgrade is not finalized. Please finalize the hdfs upgrade before running the balancer"
fields.summary: HDFS Balancer should exit with a proper message if upgrade is not finalized

comments.body: Here posted patch V001, please kindly review it, thanks.

Hi [~xiaobingo], thanks for fixing this.
# Error message should to to stderr.
# {{hdfs}} should be all capitals in the error message.
